product.title: Zcyifa Hot Curler Clips for Hair Styling Stainless Steel 16pcs Multi Color Suitable for Most Sizes
product.title_excluding_brand: Hot Curler Clips for Hair Styling Stainless Steel 16pcs Multi Color Suitable for Most Sizes
product.description:
Description

Adopted of premium material, it is practical and durable for long time use, bring you much convenience. Easy to hold and operate, won't make you feel uncomfortable when being applied on your head. It is small in size and light in weight, easy to carry, you can take them to any place you want.

Features

-Color:As Shown
-Material:Stainless steel
-Size:7.00X2.54X0.30cm/2.75X1.00X0.12in
-They can help you to achieve an even more secure hold, help to make your hair rolls more perfect.
-By using these hot curlers clips, your hair will looks so much beautiful and charming.
-Reduce the damage to the hair, help to maintain the health of your hair. You can use it easily.
-A replacement for lost or broken hot roller clip, suitable for most hot rollers' size.
-Crafted from premium material, comfortable to touch, not easy to deform or break, can serve you for a long time.
